original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Behold, thou shalt sleep with thy fathers; and this people will rise up, and go a whoring after the gods of the strangers of the land, whither they go to be among them, and will forsake me, and break my covenant which I have made with them.
korean_text: 또 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 너는 네 조상과 함께 누우려니와 이 백성은 그 땅으로 들어가 음란히 그 땅의 이방 신들을 따르며 일어날 것이요 나를 버리고 내가 그들과 맺은 언약을 어길 것이라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses
thou shalt sleep with thy fathers
and this people will rise up
and go a whoring after the gods
of the strangers of the land
whither they go to be among them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들 가운데 거하기 위해 가는 곳의

sentences.original_text: which I have made with them
